DOC.detailed_description: This double-blind , placebo-controlled crossover study adult asthmatic give minocycline 150 mg po BID placebo add-on therapy eight week . Each eight week arm separate four week wash-out . Spirometry perform baseline end arm . Daily symptom score , peak flow rate , oral steroid requirement record . A standardized asthma quality life symptom assessment make every four week ( AQLQ , Juniper ) .
